definitions.title: subst.
definitions.body: lower, lowest (places):—fs. [[תַּחׇתִּיׇּה]] † Ps 86:13, [[תַּחְתִּית]] Ex 19:17 +; mpl. [[תַּחְתִּיִּם]] † Ge 6:16; fpl. [[תַּחְתִיּוֹת]] Ps 63:10 +;—Ex 19:17 [[ויתיחבו בְּחַחְתִּית הָהָר]] in the lower part of the mt., Ju Jdg 1:15 = Jos 15:19 (so read here with LXX:MSS SyrVer Targum Vulgate for [[גֻּלּֽת תַּחְתִּיּוֹת]]) [[אֵת גֻּלַּת תַּחְתִּית]] the lower spring, Job 41:16 [[כְּפֶּלַח תַּחְתִּית]] like the lower mill-stone, Ge 6:16 (P) [[תַּחְתִּיִּם]] = lower stories; of Shₑ‘ôl), De 32:22 [[עַד שְׁאוֹל תַּחְתַּית]] to the lowest Shₑ’ôl, Ps 86:13 [[תַּחְתִּיׇּה]] ´[[מִשְּׁ]]:, so [[אֶרֶץ תַּחְתִּית]] the lowest earth (or land) i.e. Sh., Ez Eze 31:14, Eze 31:16, Eze 31:18, [[אֶרֶץ תַּחְתִיּוֹת]] the land of lowest places Eze 26:20, Eze 32:18, Eze 32:24, [[בּוֹר תַּחְתִיּוֹת]] the pit of lowest places La 3:55, Ps 88:7, [[תֵּחְתִיּוֹת]] [[הָאָרֶץ]] Ps 63:10 (+ perh. Ps 71:20) the lowest places of the earth, [[אֶרֶץ]] ´[[תּ]]: Is 44:23, and fig. of the dark and hidden interior of the womb Ps 139:15.—Ne 4:7 [[וׇאַעֲמִיד מִתַּחְתִיּוֹת לַמָּקוֹם]] and I set (LXX:L and they stood) at parts below ([[מִן]] as in [[מִחַחַת לְ]]) the place (where they were to work), so Ke Gu, but text perhaps corrupt (Berthol Sgf).
